author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: More Siam Neko News
body:
ANN linked the site for Monkey Punch's newest film at 
http://www.maxell.co.jp/siam/ . They also mentioned it hits Japanese 
theaters October 8. If you notice, the art looks similar to Dead or Alive. 
There's even a Fujiko look-alike.
